Written in C++. Compatible with Linux.

Windows and OS X support planned. Have an application in C? Not a problem, libdrc has a thin C wrapper supporting the main features.

Standalone.

No dependency, batteries included. You don't have to use any third-party framework to get started.

Multithreaded.

All the heavy lifting is made in separate threads to reduce impact on your application, because performance matters.

Buttons, sticks and touchscreen work like a charm. Your imagination is the limit!
